name: Cookies n' Dream
description:
[CONTROLS]
Move : Q & D /◀ & ▶
Jump : Space
Attack : Left mouse button 

Play as a living gingerbread boy that must help Gretel from the evil witch. But be vigilant, darkness can take many forms.

**Loosely based on the Grimm fairytale "Hansel & Gretel" (with a bit of Charles Perrault's "Le Petit Poucet" sprinkled in).**

Arix : Graphic Designer
Kiberptah : Sound Designer
Mental.Bloxx : Story Designer
RJGA : Programmer
